entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 9:22 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 9:22 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 9:22 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
